content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Duisburg, close to all important facilities.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not agree on a final price.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of you reaching an agreement with the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I would not rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement with the negotiation partner because we did not reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended.
name: Peter Schmidt
